column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rita - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry if your to-go order took longer than you expected. We try our hardest to keep the line moving
column2: but myriad factors can delay our production
column3: though we do our best to find solutions to problems as they arise. As far as pricing goes
column4: I strongly feel that we offer a quality product at a fair price
column5: especially given the higher-across-the-board prices for goods and services in Midtown. A quick Google search will reveal that the cost of living in this neighborhood is much higher than other parts of Houston.
